ComicInfo.Title: End of Time
ComicInfo.Summary: End of the road! Optimus Prime leads the Autobots in a desperate battle on multiple fronts—against the maniacal Decepticons, against the swarming Insecticlones, against the teeming rust worms, against Cybertron itself. But how many problems will the Autobots be able to solve and what offer could stop their journey?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 16:47:38. [CVDB925040]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anna Malkova, Blacky Shepherd, Ed Pirrie, Juan Samu
ComicInfo.Inker: Anna Malkova, Blacky Shepherd, Ed Pirrie, Juan Samu
ComicInfo.Colorist: David Garcia Cruz, Heather Breckel, Nahuel Ruiz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Geoff Senior, Nahuel Ruiz, Stefano Simeone, Thomas Deer
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Characters: Acid Storm, Bombshell, Bumblebee, Chromia, Codexa, Highbrow, Hound, Ironhide, Javelin , Kup, Megatron, Nominus Prime, Novastar, Optimus Prime, Perceptor, Scattershot, Sentinel Prime, Shockwave, Skywarp, Smokescreen, Solus Prime , Springer, Starscream, Strika, Subsea, Tap-Out, Termagax, Ultra Magnus, Vibes, Wheeljack, Windblade
